page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people in our area do have cars it seems. And it's clear that they like Ford cars particularly as they are by far the most popular. When asked most people said they needed their cars for transport, to get to work or to go shopping. 50% of the people said they also had motorbikes or bicycles. A big let down in the services in our area seems to be the bus service, mainly because there aren't enough buses at the right time. Between Monday and Friday there are 5 bus services running through the village, with destinations such as Reading, Windsor, Bracknell and Slough. The bus service begins at 6.37am and there 19 buses passing through the village until 22.20, but on Sunday there are only 6 buses. Several people would like to see a taxi service.
